features: Balancing Intimate Wash - Our unique formula, designed by doctors, contains boric acid which helps gently promote a balanced intimate environment and helps you stay protected against funky odors
Gently Soothing - Our comforting intimate wash with boric acid balances your natural pH range and gently removes odor. Essential oils leave you feeling fresh and clean for hours
Safe and Gentle Daily Wash - So Fresh and Clean is an intimate wash. This gentle, calming wash cleanses and hydrates sensitive areas without causing irritation or sensitivity

Feel Cared For - Our bodies are amazing and deserve the best! We make knowing your body easy & loving your parts the norm. Above all, loyal seeks to normalize how we view our bodies as something to be celebrated and cared for

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NutraBlast Boric Acid Intimate Suppositories NutraBlast Suppository Applicators NutraBlast Feminine pH Test Strips 3.0-5.5 NutraBlast Balance Shield Panty Liners NutraBlast Intimist Feminine Essential Oils Blend Spray Size 30 Count 15 Count 100-Test Roll 20 Count 2 fl oz Form Suppository Applicator Strip Panty Liner Oil Spray Product Description Boric Life's natural properties create a balanced intimate environment. These suppositories are odor-controlling & soothing Since a hands-on approach isn't for everyone, these intimate suppository applicators make it a whole lot easier to get the job done and far less messy Our easy-to-use pH test strips can help you determine if your pH is unbalanced. Convenient, portable, & accurate, these strips monitor pH levels anytime, anywhere Balance Shield isn't your basic overnight panty liner. It's made from moisture-wicking organic cotton and a pH balancing bamboo charcoal-infused layer Intimist is your anytime hydrating and deodorizing intimate mist. This blend of refreshing essential oils promotes pH balance, odor control, and discomfort relief

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is great! It keeps me super fresh and clean feeling all day. Works great while during, before and after your cycle. I am very sensitive and was initially concerned that it would irritate me. I can't even use Dove sensitive skin on my lady bits, so I was very relieved that this product delivered on its promise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Fresh & clean
reviews.reviewText: This is a miracle for me ! Im a big sweater and it’s been a game changer ! Helps with changes in your ph during different times in the month and if you have bladder leaks it even helps neutralize those odors as well ! I highly recommend this for every lady maybe even would say the gents could use this on there bits too !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do you have recurring BV? Blast it with this ...
reviews.reviewText: Ladies. Let's get very personal here. TMI, if you will. Do you have recurring BV? Bacterial Vaginosis?(I am going to repeat these terms a lot in case someone wanting to buy this needs to search those in order to find a review that talks about it)For the past 3-5 years, I have had recurring BV. It showed up out of nowhere. I've seen my doctor over and over. Im medically clean but apparently my PH is so off balance that I have recurring Bacterial Vaginosis. I have tried Boric Acid suppositories, gentle feminine washes, prebiotics, probiotics, teas for gut health, supplements for gut health, I have even tried the prescribed medicine my doctor has given me. Those antibiotics only kept my BV at bay for one month. One. Month. It got to the point where I was wearing panty liners 24/7 because the discharge was constant and THE SMELL ... Honey ... Horrible. Whenever I needed to go out among people, I was wearing a tampon to soak up the discharge so I'd stay fresh.Then I found this.A feminine wash with boric acid in it.Those boric acid suppositories work but only for 2-3 days max. That's how persistent my Bacterial Vaginosis is. But this?!?!?I have only been using 2-3 weeks and it has been a game changer. I shower every day and wash my lady parts with this wash.No smell.No (or very little) discharge.No irritation from the wash.Im over the moon.If I go 1-2 days without using this wash, my BV symptoms are still less but they do begin to creep back in ... But if you are persistent with the wash and your BV is recurring like mine, this will help IMMENSELY.You may be a little dry but it isn't unbearable or irritating (for me).Im so happy I decided to try this wash and do encourage others to try it as long as your lady parts are not super sensitive. Boric Acid can be a source of irritation for some so please know your limits.This is not something you insert into your vagina so please dont do it! This is an external wash only!But I recommend it ... 1000/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An amazing soap!
reviews.reviewText: I am so glad I used this soap. It’s an amazing purchase. I don’t mind the price so much now that I know it works . I will be buying this frequently & trying the suppositories after my period. 10 out of 10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't impressed with the wash like I had hoped. I was so impressed by the pills that I assumed the wash would be just as spectacular. I've used other feminine washes that carried me through an 8 he day even lasting through the hot summer days. But this was almost non existent. I felt fresh rite after using it but within a few hrs not so much. I wouldn't purchase this wash again as I saw no benefits different than others or better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s helped with Oder since day one of using oven been using it for about two weeks now and even after a eight hour shift of sweating and wearing thick slacks there’s little to no smell !! It’s even better when pared with the vaginal suppository’s . Love this stuff ☺️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your va-jay-jay will love you for this
reviews.reviewText: I almost returned it thinking It didn't have a safety seal until I opened the cap in realized there's an inner seal (which takes a lot of effort to remove) so that made me happy. My girl is quite SENSITIVE and I can't use just anything, but I've not been disappointed by any product from this brand! Does exactly what it claims.
